[Hi there!]{.custom-subtitle}

I'm a PhD candidate in the [Beltran Lab](https://beltranlab.ucsc.edu/) at UC Santa Cruz.

My current projects use long-term demographic datasets, passive acoustics, and bio-logging to study the ecology of marine predators. Read more about my [research](https://allisonpayne.github.io/research.html), or explore my individual [projects](https://allisonpayne.github.io/projects.html).
